title: WTB raw HOF T206; Waddel, Joss, Duffy or Chesbro
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: WTB raw HOF T206; Waddel, Joss, Duffy or Chesbro
posts.post_content:
Am looking for raw T206 HOFer to go along with this new Sweet Caporal pack I picked up in AC last week.

Here are the cards I’m looking for (all sweet Caporal back only, please)

Chesbro portrait

Duffy in sweater

Waddell portrait

Or Joss portrait

Centering matters to me a lot and am not interested in altered cards.  But some back damage is ok since the card will likely be displayed with the pack, if that makes sense.

Again, just to be clear… am only looking for raw versions of the above  

PM me with offers, thx!

Jeff
